meanings.definition: The mood or atmosphere of a place.
meanings.sent1: The ambiances of the forest were peaceful and serene.
meanings.sent2: The ambiances of the party were lively and festive.
meanings.sent3: The ambiances of the library suddenly turned into a dance party.
meanings.sent4: The ambiances of the city streets whispered tales of forgotten dreams.
meanings.sent5: The ambiances of the beach transported her to a world of tranquility.

meanings.definition: The general feeling or character of a place.
meanings.sent1: The ambiances of the classroom were studious and focused.
meanings.sent2: The ambiances of the park were relaxed and carefree.
meanings.sent3: The ambiances of the office felt like a comedy show.
meanings.sent4: The ambiances of the old house spoke of bygone eras.
meanings.sent5: The ambiances of the carnival were filled with excitement and joy.

meanings.definition: The surroundings or environment of a place.
meanings.sent1: The ambiances of the mountains were breathtaking and majestic.
meanings.sent2: The ambiances of the market were bustling and colorful.
meanings.sent3: The ambiances of the zoo felt like a jungle adventure.
meanings.sent4: The ambiances of the countryside painted a picture of peace and simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The ambiances of the city square buzzed with energy and diversity.
